 1990-28421990-12-210,  ,  EMR,  , 
PrecisRe-appointment of Wilbert H. Hopper, of Calgary, Alberta, as Chairman of the Board of Directors (Chief Executive Officer) of Petro-Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, effective December 21, 1990.
Attachments
precis:
Re-appointment of Wilbert H. Hopper, of Calgary, Alberta, as Chairman of
the Board of Directors (Chief Executive Officer) of Petro-Canada to hold
office during pleasure for a term of two years, effective December 21,
1990.
